author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of Kovai Thanganagai Thozhil Saarntha Kootamaippu will hold candles and stage a protest in front of various central government offices on Monday, urging the union government to increase the ceiling for producing Pan Card (or filling Form 60 for those without Pan Cards) to buy jewellery worth Rs. 10 lakh from the present ceiling of Rs. 2 lakh.

- Staff Reporter
title: Protest with candles
